metadata.title: CVE-2008-7315 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
UI-Dialog 1.09 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2008-7315` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libui-dialog-perl - 1.21-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libui-dialog-perl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.21-0.1').
